mapper.sql: ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID, ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ, ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR, ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME, ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG, ARTICLE_ID,ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR
mapper.insert:
insert into ARTICLE_REVIEW
ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID,
ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ,
ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR,
ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME,
ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG,
ARTICLE_ID,
ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR,
#{articleReviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{articleReviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{articleReviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{articleReviewAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{articleReviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

mapper.update:
update ARTICLE_REVIEW
ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ = #{articleReviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR = #{articleReviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME = #{articleReviewAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG = #{articleReviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR = #{articleReviewNr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID = #{articleReviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ARTICLE_REVIEW set ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ = #{articleReviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR = #{articleReviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME = #{articleReviewAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG = #{articleReviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR = #{articleReviewNr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID = #{articleReviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ARTICLE_REVIEW set ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ = #{articleReviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR = #{articleReviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME = #{articleReviewAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG = #{articleReviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID = #{articleReviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ARTICLE_REVIEW where ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG=1
and ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR like '%${articleReviewPlr}%'
and ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR like '%${articleReviewNr}%'
and ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ARTICLE_REVIEW_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ, 20) ) PLSJ, ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR, ARTICLE_REVIEW_ADDTIME, ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG, ARTICLE_ID,ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from ARTICLE_REVIEW T where ARTICLE_REVIEW_DELFLAG=1
and ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLR like '%${articleReviewPlr}%'
and ARTICLE_REVIEW_NR like '%${articleReviewNr}%'
and ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by T.ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ ASC ) as t1 order by ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ DESC) as t2 order by ARTICLE_REVIEW_PLSJ ASC
